newsitem.title: USA: U.S stocks open lower after CPI data.
newsitem.headline: U.S stocks open lower after CPI data.

text.p: The Dow Jones Industrial average opened lower on Tuesday despite May consumer inflation data meeting Wall Street's expectations.
The Dow Industrials was off about 25 points to 7,745. The Nasdaq Composite fell four to about 1,428, while the S&P Index was 2.56 at 891.
The 30-year long bond was off 13/32 at 6.73 percent yield.
